name: Space Warden alpha 0.3
description:
Space Warden is Action Shooter where whole environment can be Destroyed.
Lots of different weapons to use to eliminate any hostile entity.

We Leave Earth Long Time Ago (app. at Year ‘2580’),

after Years searching for a new home we found the solar system which consisted of 12 planets and 2 of which were habitable,

since we had no other option we land on one of them. After several generation on this planet, almost half of the population had moved to a second planet only 

a few light years away from us. We came across a new Planet that contained a new raw material, discovery of this started a War.

This material is the reason why this war started and has been going on, for generations…

 

In this Pre-Alpha 0.3

Destructible environment

2 Missions (Tutorial mission,Defense mission)

WISHLIST HERE :
